pro2E.ui.simulation.output

Class JFreeChartDPIFix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart
      • pro2E.ui.simulation.output.JFreeChartDPIFix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, org.jfree.chart.event.PlotChangeListener, org.jfree.chart.event.TitleChangeListener, org.jfree.chart.ui.Drawable

    public class JFreeChartDPIFix
extends org.jfree.chart.JFreeChart
     The JFreeChartDPIFix class is used to make JFreeCharts scale well on high resolution displays.
    Author:
    Prof. Dr. Richard Gut
